S04bsu045_u:2_0: [SaSū 1] evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
S04bsu045_u:3_3_0: āyuṣmatā ca mahākāśyapena / āyuṣmatā ca rāhulena / āyuṣmatā ca bakkulena / āyuṣmatā ca bhadravāsena / āyuṣmatā ca bhadraśriyā /
S04bsu045_u:3_3_1: āyuṣmatā ca nandaśriyā / āyuṣmatā ca jāṅgulena / āyuṣmatā ca subhūtinā / āyuṣmatā ca revatena / āyuṣmatā ca nandasenena /
S04bsu045_u:4_0: [SaSū 3] dvāṣaṣṭibhiśca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ tadyathā maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu045_u:5_0: [SaSū 4] dvāṣaṣṭibhiśca devaputrasahasraiḥ tadyathā arjunena ca devaputreṇa /
S04bsu045_u:5_1: bhadreṇa ca devaputreṇa / subhadreṇa ca devaputreṇa / dharmarucinā ca devaputreṇa /
S04bsu045_u:5_3: candavāsinā ca devaputreṇa / candanena ca devaputreṇa / candanasenena ca devaputreṇa /
S04bsu045_u:6_0: [SaSū 5] aṣṭābhiśca devakanyāsahasraiḥ tadyathā mṛdaṃginyā ca devakanyāyā /
S04bsu045_u:6_6: balinyā ca devakanyāyā / subāhuyuktayā ca devakanyāyā /
S04bsu045_u:7_0: [SaSū 6] aṣṭābhiśca nāgarājasahasraiḥ tadyathā apalālena ca nāgarājñā /
S04bsu045_u:7_1_0: elapatreṇa ca nāgarājñā / timiṅgilena ca nāgarājñā / kuṃbhasāreṇa ca nāgarājñā / kuṃbhaśīrṣeṇa ca nāgarājñā / sunandena ca
S04bsu045_u:7_1_1: nāgarājñā / suśākhena ca nāgarājñā / gavaśīrṣeṇa ca nāgārājñā / evaṃpramukhairaṣṭābhirnāgarājasahasrais
S04bsu045_u:8_0_0: [SaSū 7] te sarve yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena gṛddhrakūṭaḥ parvato yena ca bhagavāṃcchākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenopasaṃkrāmadupasaṃkramya
S04bsu045_u:8_0_1: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratastasthire /
S04bsu045_u:9_0_0: [SaSū 8] (etadavocan deśayatu bhagavāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatu sugataḥ dharmaṃ yaṃ śrutvāsme kṣipramanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyema
S04bsu045_u:9_0_1: yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ karmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaveyāt) bhagavāṃśca tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayati sma /
S04bsu045_u:10_0_0: [SaSū 9] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S04bsu045_u:11_0: [SaSū 10] bahvyo bhagavan devakoṭyopsarakanyākoṭyo bodhisattvakoṭyaḥ bahvyo bhagavaṃcchrāvakakoṭyaḥ sannipatitāḥ sanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu045_u:11_1: tatsādhu bhagavan teṣāṃ yathāsannipatitānāṃ (sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ) tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastathārūpaṃ dharmanayapraveśaṃ deśayatu /
S04bsu045_u:11_2_0: yathaiṣāṃ syāddīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca yathārūpeṇa dharmanayapraveśena deśitena vṛddhānāṃ
S04bsu045_u:11_2_1: sattvānāṃ saha śravaṇenaiva sarvakarmāvaraṇāni caiṣāṃ parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ daharāśca sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvabhiyujyamānā
S04bsu045_u:12_0_0: [SaSū 11] evamukte bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu sarveśūra sādhu khalu punastvaṃ sarvaśūra
S04bsu045_u:12_1: tena hi tvaṃ sarvaśūra śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru.
S04bsu045_u:13_0: [SaSū 12] evaṃ bhagavanniti sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pravyaśrauṣād /
S04bsu045_u:14_1: yena dharmaparyāyeṇa sarvasatvānāṃ paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇani kṣayaṃ .
S04bsu045_u:14_3: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhayaṃteḥkataro bhagavaṃ saddharmaparyāyaḥ
S04bsu045_u:15_2: yaḥ kaścit sarvaśūremaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:16_0: [SaSū 15] tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra ya imaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:16_1: yathaikasya tathāgatasya [satkāraṃ kṛtvā] puṇyaskandhastathā tāvantaṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ sa sattva prasaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu045_u:17_0: [SaSū 16] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha / yathā kathaṃ punarbhagavan draṣṭavyaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:18_0: bhagavānāha / yathā gaṃgānadībālukāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ (satkāraṃ kṛtvā) puṇyaskandhastāvantaṃ sarvaśūra te satvāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:18_1: ye sarvaśūra imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti te sarve avaivartikā bhaviṣyanti (anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodheḥ) /
S04bsu045_u:19_0_0: [SaSū 17] atha te sarve (yathāsannipatitā bodhisattvā mahāśrāvakā) devanāgamanuṣyāpsarakanyākoṭyastena kālena tena samayenotthāyāsanebhyaḥ
S04bsu045_u:19_0_1: ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṃgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjalayaḥ praṇamayya (te sarve)
S04bsu045_u:20_0_0: [SaSū 18] bhagavān āha / śṛṇu kulaputrā; ekasya buddhasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ tadyathā mahāsamudre udakabindavaḥ yāvanto
S04bsu045_u:20_0_1: jaṃbudvīpe paramāṇavaḥ yathā gaṃgānadībālikāsamāḥ sattvāste sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ yacca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S04bsu045_u:20_1: ataśca te sarvaśūra sattvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:20_2: yāvanna śakyaṃ gaṇanāyogena tasya puṇyaskandhasya paryantamadhigantuṃ /
S04bsu045_u:20_3: yasya sarvaśūra tasmin kāle tasmin samaye etad vacanaṃ śrutvā mahānutsāho bhaviṣyati sa evamaprameyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:21_0: [SaSū 19] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katame te bhagavan sattvā ye dharmaparitṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:21_1: evamukte bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - dvāvimau sarvaśūra sattvau dharmaparitṛṣitau /
S04bsu045_u:21_2: katamau dvau / yadutaikaḥ sarvaśūra sarvasattvasamacittaḥ dvitīyaḥ sarvaśūra yo dharmaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānāṃ samaṃ prakāśayati (imau dvau dharmaparitṛṣitau) /
S04bsu045_u:22_0: [SaSū 20] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - katamaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānāṃ samaprakāśanā;
S04bsu045_u:22_1: bhagavān āha - ekaḥ sarvaśūra dharmaṃ śrutvā bodhāya pariṇāmayaṃti /
S04bsu045_u:22_2: yadā ca bodhāya pariṇāmayati tadā sarvasattvā dharmaparitṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:22_3: dvitīyassarvaśūra yo mahāyānamavagāhayati sa nityaṃ dharmaparitṛṣito bhavat /
S04bsu045_u:23_0_0: [SaSū 21] atha te devanāgamanuṣyāpsarasakoṭya utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ purataḥ prāṃjalayo bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocan vayaṃ
S04bsu045_u:23_0_1: bhagavan dharmaparitṛṣitāḥ paripūrayatu bhagavān asmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cāśā /
S04bsu045_u:24_0_0: [SaSū 22] atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prāduṣcakāraḥ atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādyena
S04bsu045_u:24_0_1: bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya /
S04bsu045_u:25_0: [SaSū 23] atha khalu bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ āmantrayāmāsa /
S04bsu045_u:25_1: ye sarvaśūra sattvā ihāgatvā te sarve anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyante /
S04bsu045_u:26_0_0: [SaSū 24] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yadete sattvā ihagatvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyante
S04bsu045_u:26_0_1: bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu sarvaśūra yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
S04bsu045_u:26_1: tena hi sarvaśūra śṛṇu / iha sarvaśura pariṇāmanaviśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu045_u:27_0_0: [SaSū 25] bhūtapūrvaṃ sarvaśūrātīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairyadāpi tena kālena tena samayena ratnaśrīrnāma tathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu045_u:27_0_1: samyaksaṃbuddho loko udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ
S04bsu045_u:28_0_0: [SaSū 26] tena khalu punaḥ sarvaśūra kālenāhaṃ māṇāvako bhūvan ye sattvāḥ sāṃprataṃ mayā buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhapitāste sarve
S04bsu045_u:28_0_1: tena kālena tena samayena mṛgā abhūvan tena ca kālena tena samayenāhamevaṃ praṇidhānamakārṣīd ye kecin mṛgāḥ sāṃprataṃ duḥkhena
S04bsu045_u:28_0_2: paripīḍitāḥ ete sarve mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran sarvāṃśca tānahaṃ buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ te ca mṛgāstadvacanaṃ
S04bsu045_u:28_1: tena sarvaśūra kuśalamūlenaite sattvā ihagatvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S04bsu045_u:29_0: [SaSū 27] atha khalu sarvaśuro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavato 'ntikāttadutsāhaṃ śrutvā bhagavantametadavocat - kiyantaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:29_1: bhagavān āha / caturaśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāmāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:30_0: [SaSū 28] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - kiyantaṃ bhagavan kalpasya pramāṇaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:30_2: tadyathāpi nāma sarvaśūra kaścideva puruṣo nagaraṃ kārayeddvādaśayojanāyāmavistāraṃ ūrdhvena trīṇi yojanāni pramāṇaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:30_3_0: tacca nagaraṃ tilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ kuryāt (sa ca puruṣa śirajīvī syāt) atha sa puruṣo varṣaśatasyātyayāttatastilaphalakaiḥ
S04bsu045_u:30_3_1: paripūrṇānnagarād ekaṃ tilaphalakaṃ bahirnikṣipedanena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṇi tāni tilaphalakāni kṣayaṃ kuryāt paryavadānaṃ
S04bsu045_u:30_3_2: kuryāt tacca nagaramamūlamapratiṣṭhānāṃ bhavenna cādyāpi ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta /
S04bsu045_u:31_0: [SaSū 29] punaraparaṃ sarvaśūra (aparāṃ te upamā kariṣyāmyasyaivārthasya prasiddhaye /
S04bsu045_u:31_1: ) tadyathāpi nāma parvato bhavet paṃcaviṃśad yojanāni pramāṇena dvādaśa yojanānyūrdhvena /
S04bsu045_u:31_2_0: atha kaścideva puruṣastasya parvatasya pārśve gṛhaṃ kārayet sa dīrghasyādhvano varṣaśatasyātyayena kāśikena vastreṇaikavārā
S04bsu045_u:31_2_1: parimārjayedevaṃ kṛtvā tasya parvatasya kṣayo bhavenna ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta /
S04bsu045_u:32_0_0: [SaSū 30] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanād (ekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S04bsu045_u:32_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya) bhagavantametadavocat - ekapariṇāmanayā bhagavannevaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ
S04bsu045_u:33_0: [SaSū 31] bhagavān āha - śṛṇu kulaputra ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_2: kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ likhāpayiṣyati vācayiṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_3: sa sarvaśūraḥ sattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_4: yaḥ sarvaśūra prasannacittaḥ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtramadhyāśayena namaskariṣyati sa paṃcanavati kalpāṃ jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_6: dṛṣṭeva dharme sarvaśūra sarveṣāṃ priyo bhaviṣyati manāpaḥ na sa sarvaśūra śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_7: priyo bhaviṣyati manāpaḥ na sa sarvaśūra śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_10: maraṇakālasamaye carimanirodhe vartamāne navati buddhākoṭyaḥ saṃmukhaṃ drakṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:33_11: te ca sarvaśūra buddhā bhagavanta āśvāsayanti /
S04bsu045_u:33_12_0: mā bhaiḥ satpuruṣa tvayā saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ mahādharmaparyāyaṃ subhāṣitaṃ śrutaṃ śrutvā iyān puṇyaskandhaḥ prasūtaḥ teṣāṃ paṃcanavati
S04bsu045_u:33_12_1: buddhakoṭyaḥ pṛthak pṛthag lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:33_13: kaḥ punarvādaḥ sarvaśūra ya imaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ mahādharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ vistareṇa śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:34_0: [SaSū 32] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan saṃghāṭasūtraṃ mahādharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyāmi /
S04bsu045_u:34_2: bhagavānāha - yāvanto gaṃgānadībālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ (satkāraṃ kṛtvā) puṇyaskandhastāvantaṃ sarvaśūra sa sattvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:35_0: [SaSū 33] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - yadahaṃ bhagavan saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇomi nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstṛptiṃ saṃjānāmi /
S04bsu045_u:35_1: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu sarvaśūra yastvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ tṛptiṃ na saṃjānāni /
S04bsu045_u:35_2: ahamapi sarvaśūra dharmāṇāṃ tṛptiṃ na saṃjānāmi /
S04bsu045_u:35_3: kaḥ punarvādaḥ sarvaśūra yad bālapṛthagjanāstṛptiṃ jñāsyanti /
S04bsu045_u:36_0: [SaSū 34] yaḥ kaścit sarvaśūra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyāne prasādaṃ janayiṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:36_11: tasya sarvaśūra kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na kiṃcit pāpakāni karmāṇi saṃvetsyante /
S04bsu045_u:36_12: na ca tasya māraḥ pāpīmānavatāraṃ lapsyate /
S04bsu045_u:36_14: ye sarvaśūra imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:36_15: te yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra paṃcanavatyāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairvinipātaṃ na gamiṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:36_17: kalpaśatasahasraṃ prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti navānavati kalpasahasrāṇi mṛṣāvādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:36_19: durlabhāste sarvaśūra sattvā ya iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:37_0_0: [SaSū 35] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S04bsu045_u:37_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat - kiyantaṃ bhagavaṃ(ste sattvā) apuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:38_0: [SaSū 36] sarvaśūra āha - kiyantaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ pāpakaṃ karmaskandhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:38_1: bhagavānāha - alamalaṃ sarvaśūra mā me pāpakaṃ karmaskandhaṃ paripṛcchaḥ api tu sarvaśūra śṛṇu nirdekṣyāmi teṣāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakānāṃ pāpakaṃ akuśalaskandhaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:38_4_0: yaśca sarvaśūra dvādaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamānān tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike duṣṭacittamutpādayedyaścemaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ
S04bsu045_u:38_6: ataste sarvaśūra saddharmapratikṣepakā sattvāḥ bahutaramakuśalaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti ye mahāyāne āghātacittamutpādayiṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:39_0: [SaSū 37] sarvaśūra āha - na te bhagavan sattvā śakyaṃ mocayituṃ /
S04bsu045_u:39_2: na śakyā mocayituṃ tadyathāpi nāma sarvaśūra kaścideva puruṣaḥ kasyacit sattvasya śīrṣaṃcchiṃdyād atha sa puruṣaḥ kenacid bhaiṣajyena praliṃpena mākṣikena vā śarkarayā vā /
S04bsu045_u:39_3: guḍena vā ghṛtena vā tailena vā taṃ śīrṣaṃ pralepayet tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra śakyaṃ sa sattvaḥ punarapyutthāpayituṃ /

S04bsu045_u:78_5: eṣvāsaneṣu niṣīdanti / sa maṃ bhagavannevamāha / śṛṇu kulaputra ye sattvāḥ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:78_8: tvayā sarvaśūra saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutaṃ yastvamatrāsane niṣīdita /
S04bsu045_u:79_0: [SaSū 71] evamukte tena bhagavatā ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantametadavocat - kiyantaṃ bhagavan sa sattvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:79_1_0: atha sa bhagavāṃ padmagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ praduṣkārṣīt tadahaṃ bhagavan smitakāraṇaṃ
S04bsu045_u:79_1_1: taṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛṣṭavān ko bhagavan hetuḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tathāgataḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkaroti /
S04bsu045_u:80_0_0: [SaSū 72] sa bhagavānāha / śṛṇu kulaputra sarvaśūraḥ (bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsthāmaprāptaḥ) tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra
S04bsu045_u:80_0_1: kaścideva rājā bhaveccakravarttī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ sa caturṣu dvīpakṣetreṣu tile vāpayet tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra bahūni tasya
S04bsu045_u:81_0_0: [SaSū 73] sa bhagavānāha / tataḥ sarvaśūra kaścit sattvo bhaved yastāni tilaphalakānyekarāśiṃ kuryādanyatarāḥ puruṣastatastilaphalarāśercaikaṃ
S04bsu045_u:81_0_1: tilaphalakaṃ gṛhya dvitīye pārśve sthāpayet tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra śaknuyāt sa sattvastāni tilaphalakāni gaṇayituṃ vopamāṃ
S04bsu045_u:81_1: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata;
S04bsu045_u:82_0: [SaSū 74] bhagavān āha - evameva sarvaśūrāsya saṃghāṭasya dharmaparyāyasya yatpuṇyaskandhaṃ tanna śakyamanupamyaṃ kartumanyatra tathāgatena /
S04bsu045_u:82_1_0: tadyathā sarvaśūra yāvantaste tilaphalakāstāvāntastathāgatā bhaveyuḥ te sarve 'sya saṃghāṭasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇakuśalamūlapuṇyaṃ
S04bsu045_u:82_1_1: parikīrtayeyurna copamayāpi puṇyasya kṣayo bhavet kaḥ punarvādo yo likhiṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:83_1: kiyantaṃ bhagavan likhataḥ puṇyaṃ bhavati ya iman dharmaparyāyaṃ likhayati /
S04bsu045_u:83_2: bhagavān āha / śṛṇu kulaputra / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo bhaved yastrisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā taṃ sarvamaṃgulimātraṃcchindyāt
S04bsu045_u:84_1_0: tadyathāpi nāma yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau śilān vā prapātān vā mṛttikān vā paramāṇurajo vā te sarve rājānaścakravartino
S04bsu045_u:84_1_1: bhaveyuścaturdvīpeśvarāḥ saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra yasteṣāṃ tāvatāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ
S04bsu045_u:84_2: sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha / na śakyaṃ bhagavannanyatra tathāgatāt
S04bsu045_u:85_0_0: [SaSū 77] bhagavān āhaivameva sarvaśūra na śakyaṃ saṃghāṭasūtrasya dharmaparyāyasya likhyamānasya puṇyaskandhopamāṃ kartumyāvantasteṣāṃ
S04bsu045_u:85_0_1: rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ puṇyamato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati ya ito dharmaparyāyādekākṣaramapi likhitvā sthāpayedbahutaraṃ tasya

S04bsu045_u:86_0_0: [SaSū 78] evameva sarvaśūra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānasaddharmadhārakasya pratipattisthitasya yatpuṇyaṃ tanna
S04bsu045_u:86_0_1: śakyaṃ rājabhiścakravartibhirabhibhavituṃ evamevāsya saṃghāṭasya dharmaparyāyasya lekhanādyatpuṇyaṃ tanna śakyamupamāṃ kartuṃ /
S04bsu045_u:86_1: imaṃ sarvaśūra saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ puṇyanidhānāni darśayati /
S04bsu045_u:86_2: sarvakleśānupaśamayati / sarvadharmolkāṃ jvālayati / sarvamārān pāpīmataḥ parājayati /
S04bsu045_u:87_0_0: [SaSū 79] evamukte sarvaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - iha bhagavan brahmacaryaṃ paramaduṣkaracaryāḥ
S04bsu045_u:87_0_1: tatkasya hetoḥ durlabhā bhagavaṃstathāgatacaryāḥ evameva durlabhā brahmacaryāḥ yadā ca brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:87_3: yadā ca tathāgataṃ paśyati tadā pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyati /
S04bsu045_u:87_7: tadāsya maraṇakālasamaye trāsaṃ notpadyate na sa jātu mātuḥ kukṣāvupapatsyate /
S04bsu045_u:88_0: [SaSū 80] evamukte bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra nanu durlabhastathāgatānamutpādaḥ āha /
S04bsu045_u:88_2: bhagavān āha / evameva sarvaśūra durlabho yaṃ saṃghāto dharmaparyāyaḥ yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ sarvaśūrāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:88_6: paṃcaviṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇi śuddhāvāsakāyikānān devānāṃ sahabhāvyatāyāṃ upapatsyate /
S04bsu045_u:89_4: na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati (na viṣeṇa nāgninā na cāsya paropakramabhayaṃ bhaviṣyati) /
S04bsu045_u:90_3: darśanīyaḥ yathā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya rūpakāyapariniṣpattistathā tasya bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:91_4: yadā daridro bhavati tadā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilapsyate /
S04bsu045_u:91_8: maraṇakālasamaye carimavijñānanirodhe vartamāne na viparītasaṃjñī bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:92_0: [SaSū 84] sa pūrvasyān diśi dvādaśa gaṃgānadībālikāsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ saṃmukhan drakṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:92_2: paścimasyān diśi paṃcaviṃśatirgaṃgānadībālikāsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ saṃmukhaṃ drakṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:92_3: uttarasyān diśi viṃśatirgaṃgānadībālukāsamān buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ saṃmukhaṃ drakṣyati /

S04bsu045_u:93_1: mā bhaiḥ kulaputra tvayā saṃghāṭaṃ (sūtran) dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā iyantaḥ sāṃparāyikāni guṇānuśaṃsamukhāni ca bhaviṣyanti /

S04bsu045_u:93_4: (bhagavān) āha / ete bhoḥ kulaputra tathāgatāstava sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā darśanāya /
S04bsu045_u:93_5: āha / kiṃ mayā kuśalakarma kṛtaṃ yeneme bahavastathāgatā āgatā /
S04bsu045_u:94_0: [SaSū 86] āha / śṛṇu kulaputra tvayā mānuṣyakamātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotrāvabhāsamāgataṃ /
S04bsu045_u:94_2: (sarvaśūra) āha / yadi mama bhagavanna etāvān puṇyaskandhaḥ kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ sakalasamāptaṃ śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:95_0: [SaSū 87] (bhagavān) āhālaṃ bhoḥ kulaputra śṛṇu catuṣpadikāyā gāthāyā (śrutāyāḥ) puṇyaṃ varṇayāmi /
S04bsu045_u:95_1: tadyathā kulaputra trayodaśa gaṃgānadībālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yaḥ puṇyasakandhastato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu045_u:96_0: [SaSū 88] śṛṇu kulaputra yaścemaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ (nāma) sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ vistareṇa śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:96_1_0: yaśca sarvasyāṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tilaṃ vāpayedyāvantaste tilaphalakāstāvanto rājānaścakravartino bhaveyuratha
S04bsu045_u:96_1_1: kaścideva puruṣo bhavedāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ yathākāmikaṃ dānan
S04bsu045_u:96_1_2: dadyāt tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūrāpi tu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaved āha /
S04bsu045_u:96_2_0: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata; bhagavān āha - yāvantaḥ kulaputra teṣāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ dānan dadataḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ yaścaikasya
S04bsu045_u:96_2_1: srotaāpannasya dānan dadyādayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu045_u:97_0: [SaSū 89] ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvāste sarve srotaāpanā bhaveyusteṣāṃ sarverṣāṃ dānan dadato yatpuṇyaskandhaṃ ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /

S04bsu045_u:97_1_1: dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
S04bsu045_u:97_2_0: ya ekasyānāgāmino dānān dadyād ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvāste sarve nāgāmino bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan
S04bsu045_u:97_2_1: dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasyārhato dānan dadyād ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ
S04bsu045_u:97_2_2: lokadhātau sattvāste sarve 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ
S04bsu045_u:97_3_0: ya ekasya pratyekabuddhasya dānan dadyād ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvāste sarve pratyekabuddhā bhaveyusteṣān
S04bsu045_u:97_3_1: sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya bodhisattvasya dānan dadyād
S04bsu045_u:97_3_2: ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvāste sarve bodhisattvā bhaveyusteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ ayaṃ
S04bsu045_u:98_0: [SaSū 90] yaśca trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tathāgataparipūrṇāyāṃ cittaṃ prasādayed yaścemaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:98_1: kimaṃga punaḥ sarvaśūra ya iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:98_2: śrutvā ca dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:98_3: kaḥ punarvādaḥ sarvaśūra ya imaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cittaprasādena namaskariṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:99_0: [SaSū 91] tatkiṃ manyase sarvaśūra śakyamidaṃ sūtraṃ bālapṛthagjanaiḥ śrotuṃ āha /
S04bsu045_u:99_1: no hīdaṃ bhagavan āha / ye ca śroṣyanti na ca prasādamutpādayiṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:99_2: śṛṇu sarvaśūra santi kecit sarvaśūra bālapṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ ye śaknuyurmahāsamudre gādhaṃ labdhum āha /
S04bsu045_u:100_0: [SaSū 92] (bhagavān) āha / asti punaḥ sarvaśūra kaścit sattvo ya ekapāṇitalena samudraṃ kṣapayed āha /
S04bsu045_u:100_1: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata /
S04bsu045_u:100_2: bhagavān āha / yathā sarvaśūra nāsti sa kaścit sattvo yaḥ śaknuyādekapāṇitalena /
S04bsu045_u:100_3_0: mahāsamudraṃ śoṣayituṃ / evameva sarvaśūra ye hīnādhimuktikāḥ sattvāḥ na śakyaṃ tairayan dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ yaiḥ sarvaśūrāśītirgaṃgānadībālukāsamāni
S04bsu045_u:100_4: na taiḥ śakyamayaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhituṃ /
S04bsu045_u:100_5: yairnavati gaṃgānadībālikāsamāni tathāgatāni na dṛṣṭāni na taiḥ śakyamayan dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotum
S04bsu045_u:101_0: [SaSū 93] yena tathāgatakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi na dṛṣṭāni ta iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā pratikṣipanti /
S04bsu045_u:101_1: yaiḥ sarvaśūra gaṃgānadībālukāsamāni tathāgatakoṭīśatāni dṛṣṭāni ta iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prasādacittamutpādayanti harṣayanti yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
S04bsu045_u:101_2: ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ śaddadhanti na pratikṣipanti /
S04bsu045_u:102_0_0: [SaSū 94] śṛṇu sarvaśūra ye kecid asmāt saṃghāṭāddharmaparyāyadekākṣarāmapi catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ likhiṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvaśūra
S04bsu045_u:102_0_1: sattvānāṃ tataḥ paścāt paṃcanavati koṭīsahasrāni lokadhātunāmatikramya yathā sukhāvatīlokadhātustathā teṣāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
S04bsu045_u:102_1: teṣāṃ ca sarvaśūra sattvānāṃ caturaśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:103_0: [SaSū 95] śṛṇu sarvaśūra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asmāt saṃghāṭāddharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:103_1_0: badyathā sarvaśūra kaścit sattvo bhaved (raudraḥ sāhasikaḥ saddharmavimukhaḥ paralokanirapekṣaḥ pāpakārī) yaḥ paṃcānantaryāṇi
S04bsu045_u:103_1_1: karmāṇi kuryāt kārayed vā kriyamāṇāni vānumodet sacet sa itaḥ saṃghāṭāddharmaparyāyaccatuṣpadikamapi gāthāṃ śṛṇuyāt tasya
S04bsu045_u:104_1: tadyathāpi kaścit sattvo bhavedyaḥ stūpabhedaṃ kārayet saṃghabhedaṃ ca /
S04bsu045_u:104_2: bodhisattvaṃ samādheruccālayet buddhajñānasyāntarāyaṃ kuryāt mātāpitaraṃ jīvitādvyāvaropayed
S04bsu045_u:105_0: atha sa sattvaḥ paścādvipratisārībhūtaḥ śoceta parideveta naṣṭo 'ham anena kāyena naṣṭaṃ me paralokamiti /

S04bsu045_u:179_1: śrutvā cāsyaivaṃ bhaved avaśyamayaṃ mama ghātayitukāmaḥ tataḥ sa rājā ruṣṭastān pārṣadyānevaṃ vaded gacchantu bhavanta etaṃ puruṣaṃ parvatavivaraṃ nītvā jīvitādvyaparopayatha;
S04bsu045_u:179_3: atha te sarve jīvitādvyavaropitāḥ tasya (ca) sarve svajanabandhuvargāḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhaveyuḥ
S04bsu045_u:180_0: [SaSū 164] evameva sarvaśūra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sattvānān dharman deśayati /
S04bsu045_u:180_1: tatra yathā sa puruṣo 'dhimānika evaṃ bālapṛthagjanāstathāgataṃ rūpavarṇaliṃgasaṃsthānato nimittamudgṛhya tathāgatakāyamiti saṃjānanti /
S04bsu045_u:181_0: [SaSū 165] tatra te bahūn dharmaṃcchrutvādhimāne patanti nānāpralāpān pralapanti /
S04bsu045_u:181_1: ahaṃkāramamakāreṇābhibhūtāḥ (sattvāḥ) svayameva dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti na prakāśayanti /
S04bsu045_u:181_2: yaḥ kaścit sūtraṃ vā gāthāṃ vāntaśo dṛṣṭāntaṃ vā teṣāṃ ārocayati /
S04bsu045_u:181_4: vayaṃ svayaṃ jānīmaha iti / tatkasya hetoryathāpīdamadhimānatvātte ca bāhuśrutyena pramādamāpadyante /
S04bsu045_u:182_1: na te tathārūpaṃ dharmopasaṃhitaṃ vacanaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:183_1: bahavastvayā vayaṃ śilpajñānaṃ śikṣāpitāḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ svamātmānaṃ na śaknuṣe parisaṃsthāpayituṃ /
S04bsu045_u:183_2: sa teṣāṃ evaṃ vadenna śakyaṃ mārṣā idānīmātmānaṃ parisaṃsthāpayituṃ /
S04bsu045_u:184_0: [SaSū 168] tatra te sattvā(stasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā) nānāprakāraṃ paridevayiṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:184_1: yathā tasyaikapudgalasyarthena bahavo jñatṛsaṃghā jīvitādvyavaropitā anaparādhinaḥ svakarmapratyayena /
S04bsu045_u:184_2_0: evameva te sattvā maraṇakālasamaye teṣāṃ paridevatāṃ narakatiryagyoniparāyaṇaṃ ātmānaṃ samanupaśyantaḥ akalyāṇamitrahetoḥ
S04bsu045_u:184_3: mā yūyaṃ pramattā bhavathaḥ tadyathāpināmājātapakṣaḥ śakunirna śaknotyākāśe prakramituṃ devalokagamanāya /
S04bsu045_u:184_4: evameva yuṣmābhir(ahaṃkāramamakārasthitair)na śakyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ anuprāptuṃ na yuṣmākaṃ tathā ṛddhiḥ saṃvidyate /
S04bsu045_u:184_5: tatkasya hetoḥ karmaprakaraṇena yūyaṃ kukkuṭayonyā ivotpannāḥ na cireṇāyaṃ kāyo bhedanadharmā maraṇaparyavasāno bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:185_0: [SaSū 169] kimayaṃ asmābhirātmabhāvaḥ sandhārito ye vayaṃ na devasukhaṃ na manuṣyalokasukhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāma /
S04bsu045_u:186_3: pṛcchatha yūyaṃ mārṣāstathāgataṃ yadyadevākāṃkṣathāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sarvābhiprāyān paripūrayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu045_u:187_0: [SaSū 171] atha khalu te sarve brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā utthāyāsanebhyaḥ ekāṃsāni cīvarāṇi pravṛtyāṃjalayaḥ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti (sma) /
S04bsu045_u:187_1: bahūni bhagavaṃ sattvāni rātrindivastathāgataḥ saṃsārā parimocayati /
S04bsu045_u:187_2: na ca sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S04bsu045_u:187_3: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yatte sattvā samānā utpādanirodhaṃ darśayanti /
S04bsu045_u:190_0: [SaSū 172] tatra khalu bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayati sma /
S04bsu045_u:190_3_0: (śṛṇutha yūyaṃ kulaputrā ihānantāparyanta pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturato nāṃtataraḥ sattvadhātuḥ santi ca sattvāḥ
S04bsu045_u:190_3_1: ye sattvahitārthamutpādanirodhaṃ darśayaṃti) paścime tu kāle bhaviṣyanti daharā sattvā vṛddhā vā ye utpādanirodhaṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:190_4: santi bhaiṣajyasena vṛddhā sattvā daharā iva na kiṃcijjānanti /
S04bsu045_u:191_0: [SaSū 173] tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣaḥ śiraṃ śocayeta navakāni ca vastrāṇi pravṛṇuyāt sa ca gṛhādbahirniṣkrameta /
S04bsu045_u:191_3: atha kaścidevāparaḥ sattvo bhavet sa śiraḥ śocayeta purāṇakāni ca vastrāṇi (śocayitvā) prāvṛṇuyāt tāni ca śithilakāni bhavanti na ca śobhante /
S04bsu045_u:191_4: sa ca puruṣaḥ susnātaśirā bhavati vastraṃ cāsya na śobhate /
S04bsu045_u:191_5: evameva bhaiṣajyasena saṃti vṛddhā sattvā ye jaṃbūdvīpaṃ na śobhayanti /
S04bsu045_u:192_0_0: [SaSū 174] atha khalu te sarve 'nyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇā utthāyasanād bhagavantametadavocan - ko bhagavannasmākaṃ
S04bsu045_u:192_0_1: vṛddho vā daharo vā bhagavān āha - vṛddhā yūyaṃ punaḥ punarnarakatiryakpreteṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ dṛṣṭvā tadadyāpi yūyaṃ tṛptiṃ
S04bsu045_u:193_0_0: [SaSū 175] atha khalu te sarve brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthāḥ sarve ca nāgarājāno bhagavantametadavocan -
S04bsu045_u:193_0_1: na bhūyo bhagavannutsahāma saṃsāre duḥkhāṃ vedanāmanubhavituṃ te cānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇā evamāhuḥ
S04bsu045_u:193_0_2: na santi daharā sattvā ye śaknuyurdharmatāṃ sākṣāt kartum /
S04bsu045_u:194_0_0: [SaSū 176] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paśya bhadanta bhagavan kiyadduradhimocyā
S04bsu045_u:194_0_1: ime sattvāḥ bhagavān āha - śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena saṃprataṃ tathāgataḥ sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ karoti /
S04bsu045_u:195_0: [SaSū 177] atha khalu catunavati koṭīsahasrāṇi navakānāṃ sattvānāṃ te tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitāḥ na ca tathāgataṃ bandanti nālapanti na saṃlapanti /
S04bsu045_u:195_1_0: tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayanti / atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ
S04bsu045_u:195_1_1: pratyayo yadete sattvā bhagavantaṃ nālapanti na saṃlapanti na vandanti na ca bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
S04bsu045_u:195_2: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena ye sattvā evaṃ vadanti na śakyaṃ navakaiḥ sattvairdharmatā sākṣāt kartum /
S04bsu045_u:195_3: / ta ete bhaiṣajyasena navakāḥ sattvā yuṣmābhirdraṣṭavyāḥ te ca sattvā evaṃ āhurvayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan navakāḥ sattvā vayaṃ bhadanta sugata navakāḥ sattvā /
S04bsu045_u:195_4: bhagavān āha - eṣāṃ bho sattvānāṃ lokapratyakṣaṃ sāṃprataṃ svaśarīrāllokasya pramānaṃ darśayatha /
S04bsu045_u:196_0_0: [SaSū 178] tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena caturnavati koṭīsahasrāṇi navakānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāyasya bhedādantarikṣe sthitvā
S04bsu045_u:196_0_1: daśabhūmipratilabdhā abhūvan atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - sulabdhā lābhā bhagavannīdṛśāḥ
S04bsu045_u:196_0_2: sattvāḥ ye saṃsāre parikṣayāya paryadānāya vīryamārabhante /
S04bsu045_u:196_1: adyaiva bhagavannime sattvā utpannāḥ adyaiva bhagavannime sattvāḥ parimuktāḥ (adyaiva) sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu045_u:197_0: [SaSū 179] atha khalu sarvabrāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā nāgarājāno 'pi mārāśca pāpīyānaṃ saparivāraṃ upasaṃkrāntaṃ vicakṣuṣkaraṇāya;
S04bsu045_u:197_1: sarve ca te bhagavantametadavocanniha vayaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntā vicakṣuṣkaraṇāya /
S04bsu045_u:197_2: te vayaṃ bhagavanniman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prasādapratilabdhā abhūvan buddhe ca dharme ca /
S04bsu045_u:197_3: tatrāsmākaṃ bhagavan sarveṣāṃ evaṃ bhagavatyevaṃrūpaṃ buddhasukhaṃ pratilabhema;
S04bsu045_u:197_4: // evaṃrūpāśca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke bhavema;
S04bsu045_u:198_0_0: [SaSū 180] bhagavān āhaivametadbhadramukhā evametadyathā yūyaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntāḥ tairyuṣmābhirimaṃ
S04bsu045_u:198_1: tena yūyaṃ bhadramukhāḥ kuśalamūlena na cireṇa kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyadhve /
S04bsu045_u:199_0_1: 'bhūvat sarve ca daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ sarve ca te bodhisattvā uparyantarīkṣe sapta tālān vaihāyasamabhyudgamya
S04bsu045_u:199_2: atha tāvadeva te sarve bhagavata uparimūrdhni sthitvā bhagavantaṃ nānāpuṣpairabhyavakiranti /
S04bsu045_u:199_4: svakāye ca buddhasaṃjñāmutpādayantyanekāni ca devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi (divyapuṣp[SaSū ai]s) tathāgatamabhyavakiranti (smaḥ) /
S04bsu045_u:200_1_0: mahālābhaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ mahākṣetraṃ lokanāthaḥ samādhibalādhānaprāptaḥ vijño vijñārthikaḥ yaḥ īdṛśān sattvān saṃsārādanupūrveṇopāyakauśalyena
S04bsu045_u:200_1_1: parimocayatyekena subhāṣitamātreṇa etāvanti sattvāni saṃsārāt parimucyante /
S04bsu045_u:201_0_0: [SaSū 183] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S04bsu045_u:201_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo ya eta devaputrā evaṃ
S04bsu045_u:201_3: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu kulaputra na hi te māṃ stunvanti /
S04bsu045_u:201_7: sarvabuddhaparigṛhītāśca bhaviṣyantyanuttarāsyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyābhisaṃbudhya ca dharman deśayiṣyanti (ca) /
S04bsu045_u:202_0_0: [SaSū 184] atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bahavo bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ bahavo
S04bsu045_u:202_0_1: bhadanta sugataḥ sattvā rātrindivaṃ parimucyante tadadyāpi sattvānāṃ kṣayo na bhavati /
S04bsu045_u:202_1: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
S04bsu045_u:202_2_0: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyasena kaścideva puruṣo bhavedāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ prabhūtabhogaḥ bahudhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamanvāgataḥ
S04bsu045_u:202_2_1: bahudāsadāsīkarmakarapauruṣeyāni cāsya syuḥ bahūni ca dhanaskandhāni bhaveyuḥ bahūni ca kṣetrārāmāṇi saṃvidyeran bahūni ca
S04bsu045_u:202_3: tadyathā yavagodhumaśālitilamāṣamudgādīni sa ca puruṣo vasantakāle sarvāni tāni dhanadhānyāni vāpayeta /
S04bsu045_u:202_4: atha yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena sarvāṇi tāni dhanadhānyāni paripadyaran sa paripakvānīti viditvā sa yāvadabhyantaragṛhe praveśayeta;
S04bsu045_u:202_5: sa puruṣastāni dhanadhānyāni gṛhasyābhyantare pṛthak pṛthak sthāpayati /
S04bsu045_u:202_6: sthāpayitvā paribhuṃkte / yāvadvasantakāle (samaye) punareva tāni bījāni vāpayati /
S04bsu045_u:203_0: [SaSū 185] evameva bhaiṣajyasena ime sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛtvā paścāt teṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ parikṣayāt punaḥ punarapi puṇyakṣetrameṣante kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti /
S04bsu045_u:203_1: kuśalamūlānyavaropayitvā tatra ca kuśaladharme pratipatya saṃpādayanti /
S04bsu045_u:203_4: tena ca prītiprāmodyacittena bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi na nāśyante /
S04bsu045_u:203_5: evameva bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo na kadācid vināśadharmā bhavati /
S04bsu045_u:204_0: [SaSū 186] āha / kathaṃ bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu045_u:204_1: bhagavān āha / bahūni bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati /
S04bsu045_u:204_4: na śakyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena pāpakarmaṇā sattvena tīvraṃ duḥkhamapanayituṃ na ca pāpena svapnena dṛṣṭenāsya bhayaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu045_u:205_0: [SaSū 187] bhaiṣajyasena āha - katamāni bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati /
S04bsu045_u:205_1: bhagavān āha - agniṃ bhaiṣajyasena prajvalitaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu045_u:205_2: tatra tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittaṃ utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśāni me dagdhāḥ dvitīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena udakaṃ paśyati luḍitaṃ saṃpraluḍitaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:205_3: tatra tena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na bhettavyaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:205_4: tatkasya hetoḥ evaṃ hi bhaiṣajyasena bodhisattvena sarvamohabandhanāni vinivartya sarvapāpakṣayaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu045_u:205_5: tṛtīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati mahābhayaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:206_0: [SaSū 188] bhagavān āha - svaśarīre śīrṣaṃ muṇḍitaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu045_u:206_1: tatra tena bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na bhettavyaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ rāgadveṣamohāni me muṇḍitāni bhavanti /
S04bsu045_u:206_2: ṣaḍgatikaṃ ca me saṃsāraṃ parājitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:206_4: na tiryakṣu na preteṣu (vā) nāsureṣu (vā) na nāgeṣu na deveṣu pariśuddheṣu bhaiṣajyasena buddhakṣetreṣu prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ upapattiṃ pratigṛhṇāti /
S04bsu045_u:207_0: [SaSū 189] (bhaviṣyati) bhaiṣajyasena paścime kāle paścime samaye yadi kaścit sattvo bodhau cittaṃ pariṇamayiṣyati /
S04bsu045_u:207_3: tatra(tena) bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisattvena na parikhedacittamutpādayitavyaṃ na vyavasitavyaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:208_0_0: [SaSū 190] bahavo bhaiṣajyasena mayā dharmā deśitāḥ mayā ca bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpaniyutaśatasahasrāni duṣkaracaryā cīrṇā
S04bsu045_u:208_0_1: na mayā bhaiṣajyasena rājyabhogārthāya vā vṛttibhogārthāya vā aiśvaryabhogārthāya vā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇāḥ svabhāvadharmāvabodhāya
S04bsu045_u:208_0_2: bhaiṣajyasena mayā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇāḥ na ca me tāvadanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā yāvanna mayāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ
S04bsu045_u:208_0_3: śrutaḥ yasminstu bhaiṣajyasena kālasamaye mayāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāya śrutaḥ tatraiva me divase anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
S04bsu045_u:208_0_4: gaṃbhīro yaṃ bhaiṣajyasena dharmaparyāyaḥ durlabho 'sya bhaiṣajyasena dharmaparyāyasya kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi śravaḥ
S04bsu045_u:208_0_5: paramadurlabho bhaiṣajyasena tathāgatānāmutpādaḥ paramadurlabhā bhaiṣajyasenāsya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaḥ
S04bsu045_u:209_2: kalpaśatasahasraṃ bhaiṣajyasena sattvā saṃsārāt paścānmukhaṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu045_u:209_7: bhavyā abhijñākuśalasthānaṃ prajñatum bhavyāḥ kuśalasthānanirodhaṃ prajñātum
S04bsu045_u:210_1: āha / artha ucyate bhagavan dharmasthānam bhagavānāha - katamaṃ bhaiṣajyasena dharmasthānaṃ /
S04bsu045_u:210_5: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yas(tvaṃ) tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
S04bsu045_u:211_0: [SaSū 193] āha / kena kāreṇana bhagavan tathāgatā loka utpadyante /
S04bsu045_u:211_1: bhagavān āha - ye bhaiṣajyasena bāhuśrutyasamanvāgamaṃ prajānanti /
S04bsu045_u:211_3: te tathāgatānāmutpādaṃ jñātvā idaṃ tathāgatānāmutpādasukhasthānaṃ prajānanti /
S04bsu045_u:211_4: yadā ca tathāgatā loka utpadyante tadā sattvā sarvadharmān prajānanti /
S04bsu045_u:212_0: [SaSū 194] āha jñānamevaṃ jñātvā katamaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prajānanti /

S04bsu045_u:251_3: sa bhagavān āha - na bhaiṣajyasena tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ (vā) na śrutaṃ (vā) yadacetane vṛkṣe manuṣyā jāyaṃte /

S04bsu045_u:251_5: sa bhagavān āha - icchasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena draṣṭuṃ tadahaṃ sāṃprataṃ darśayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu045_u:252_0: [SaSū 223] atha khalu bhagavāṃścandrāvatikṣetrastathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ śatapuṇyavicitritaṃ svaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayati sma /

S04bsu045_u:253_3: sa bhagavān āha - ete acetanā janakāyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ eta acetanā manuṣyāḥ pratyājātāḥ /

S04bsu045_u:257_9: evaṃ te bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ sattvāḥ kuśalamajānānāḥ notpādaṃ jānanti na nirodhaṃ jānanti /
